name: HappyBirthdaySong
0:
”Alexa, open happy birthday song”
”Alexa, start happy birthday song”
”Alexa, launch happy birthday song”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy birthday song
des:
Happy Birthday Song is a skill that plays you birthday songs for yourself, friends or family members.

You can play this skill for your friends, family, or anyone during their birthdays.

Happy Birthday everyone!!!

NOTE;
By default, the song will loop until you stop it. To pause or stop the skill, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
